title: Couchsurfing informs you about the fact that you can disable cookies

tosdr.case: third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
tosdr.tldr:
"Cookies 
Most web browsers are set to accept cookies by default. If you prefer, 
you can usually choose to set your browser to remove or reject browser 
cookies; however, our Services may not function properly if you do 
so."
